Created attachment 559105
screenshot

User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.0) AppleWebKit/535.1 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/13.0.782.220 Safari/535.1

Steps to reproduce:

pasted some content into a new email. The content pasted has some bold text in it.


Actual results:

it was pasted correctly. I try to type my email above the pasted text. But it appears bold also. It's not possible to unbold anything else that I type.


Expected results:

I should be able to somehow unbold text that I don't want to bold. The only option I can do is to not paste any bold text into the email at all.
